frontmatter.title: Catch
frontmatter.desc:
Why compete when you can always win?  Using processing, I created a game where two players  collaboratively keep a digital ball inside the screen. 
Once the ball escapes the screen, they will click the ellipse to continue playing. The game continues until they reach 10 points.
